bootstrap.css generated via customize with the following changes:
 - no Responsive
 - no Tables
 - @baseFontSize = 13px
 - @baseLineHeight = 19px
 - @iconSpritePath = 'images/glyphicons-halflings.png'
 - @iconWhiteSpritePath = 'images/glyphicons-halflings-white.png'
 - @inputBackground = #FFFFF5
 - added phone icon to glyphicons (new row at y 160px)

AFTER bootstrap.css is generated with above variable, modify the css as following (no way to override it):
